gurmukhi: icMk hY cwvfw iPMk hY iP`krI nwc hY bIr bYqwl pRyqM ]383]
transliteration: Chink Hai Chaavadaa Phink Hai Phikkarinaach Hai Beer Baitaal Pretan||383||
translation: I shall wage such a horrible war that the vultures will become happy, the vampires will roam and the ghosts and fiends will dance.383.

gurmukhi: qws nyjy FulY Gor bwjy bjY rwm lIny dlY Awn FUky ]
transliteration: Taas Neje Dhulai Ghor Baaje Bajai Raam Leene Dalai Aan Dhooke||
translation: Look there, the swinging lances are visible, the terrible instruments are resounding and Ram has arrived with his mighty forces;

gurmukhi: bwnrI pUq icMkwr ApwrM krM mwr mwrM chUM Er kUky ]
transliteration: Baanaripoot Chinkaar Apaaran Karan Maar Maaran Chahoon Or Kooke||
translation: The sound of “kill, kill” is emanating form the army of monkeys from all the four sides;

gurmukhi: BIm ByrI bjY jMg joDw gjY bwn cwpY clY nwih jau lO ]
transliteration: Bheem Bheribajai Jan Jodhaa Gadai Baan Chaapai Chalai Naah(i) Jau Lau||
translation: O Ravana ! till the time the war-drums resound and the thundering warriors discharge their arrows;

gurmukhi: bwq ko mwnIAY Gwqu pihcwnIAY rwvrI dyh kI swNq qau lO ]384]
transliteration: Baat Ko Maaneeai Ghaat(u) Paihchaaneeai Raavarideh Kisaant Tau Lau||384||
translation: Recognising the opportunity before that, accept my saying for the protection of your body (and leave the idea of war).384.

gurmukhi: Gwt GwtY rukO bwt bwtY qupo AYNT bYTy khw rwm Awey ]
transliteration: Ghaat Ghaatai Roukau Baat Baatai Toupo Ainth Baithe Kahaa Raam Aae||
translation: Obstruct the movement of the armies on the sea-shore and other routes, because now ram has arrived,

gurmukhi: Kor hrwm hrIP kI AwNK qY cwm ky jwq kYsy clwey ]
transliteration: Khor Haraam Dareeph Kiaaakh Tai Chaam Ke Jaat Kaise Chadhaae||
translation: Do all the work by removing the veil of heresy form your eyes and do not become self-willed.

gurmukhi: hoiego KuAwr ibsIAwr Kwnw qurw bwnrI pUq jau lO n gij hY ]
transliteration: Hoego Khuaar Biseeaar Khaanaa Turaa Baanaripoot Jau Lau Na Gad(i) Hai||
translation: If you remain in distress, your family will be destroyed; you can feel yourself protected till the army of monkeys does not begin its violent thunderings;

gurmukhi: lMk ko CwifkY koit ky PwNDkY AwsurI pUq lY Gwis Bij hY ]385]
transliteration: Lank Ko Chhaad(i)kai Ke Phaandh-kai Aasuripoot Lai Ghaas(i) Bhaj(i) Hai||385||
translation: After that all the son demos will flee, after jumping over the walls of th citadel and pressing the blades of grass in their mouths.385.

gurmukhi: bwvrI rwNf ikAw BwNq bwqY bkY rMk sy rwm kw Cof rwsw ]
transliteration: Baavariraand Kiaa Bhaant Baatai Bakai Rank Se Raam Kaa Chhodh Raasaa||
translation: O foolish prostitute ! why do you prattle Stop the praises of Ram;

gurmukhi: kwFho bwis dY bwn bwjIgrI dyiKho Awj qw ko qmwsw ]
transliteration: Kaadh- Ho Baas(i) Dai Baan Baajeegadidekhioh Aaj Taa Ko Tamaasaa||
translation: He will only discharge very small arrows like incense-stick towards me, I shall see this sport today.

gurmukhi: bIs bwhy DrM sIs dsXM isrM sYx sMbUh hY sMig myry ]
transliteration: Bis Baahe Dharan Sees Dayan Siran Sain Sanbooh Hai San(i) Dere||
translation: I have twenty arms and ten heads and all the forces are with me;
